message.body: Hey Sam I just saw your text. Would tomorrow work?
Tonight if you want, but I'm not sure if you should notarize intoxicated.
Tomorrow would be fine. Just let me know when's best, and your place or mine.
Let me know if your going out doing errands tomorrow and could stop by otherwise we will come over
I'll let you know tomorrow. It's not really difficult to stop by, errands or no.
Ok well we are here all day so anytime works
Just give me a convenient time and ill stop by.
